Trial_Design.evidence: 16 mice received 50 μg 6G5j-IR700DX via the tail vein 24 h before surgery and were randomized to two groups: FGS-only ( n = 8) and FGS + PIT ( n = 8).

Intervention.evidence: randomized to two groups: FGS-only ( n = 8) and FGS + PIT ( n = 8).

Number_Randomised.evidence: randomized to two groups: FGS-only ( n = 8) and FGS + PIT ( n = 8).

Result_Outcome.evidence: The metastatic recurrence rate was 100.0% for FGS-only and 25.0% for FGS + PIT ( p = 0.007). The average total recurrent tumor weight was 2370.3 ± 1907.8 mg for FGS-only and 705.5 ± 1200.0 mg for FGS + PIT ( p = 0.039).
